text: The Black-Tongued Maiden
She is lean, supple and sinuous - yet her tongue is only one thing: A swift death.
Known for her exceptional hunting skills, Birna's precision in battle increases the accuracy and damage output of ranged units under her command.
Hunters Prowess
Birna fosters unity within the Sarl tribe, reducing the likelihood of internal conflicts and rebellions. Her leadership ensures a cohesive and loyal community.
Sarl Marauders
As the Longship Artisan, Birna accelerates the construction of formidable longships, enhancing naval capabilities for both trade and raiding in coastal regions.
Pelt Specialists
As she cries out unnatural echoes her pitch black tongue vibrates and calls a flock of murderous crows as they hail down on her enemy.
Flock of Torment
As a shieldmaiden of the Sarl tribe, Birna imparts her combat expertise to aspiring warriors, reducing the recruitment cost and improving the effectiveness of Sarl Shieldmaiden units.
Birna's Call
Birna's mastery over timbercraft fuels the growth of Sarl settlements, improving economic output and fortifications in the tribe's territories
Timber Mastery
Birna's Mutantbane Legacy improves the resilience of Sarl settlements against mutant incursions, ensuring the tribe remains protected from the dangers of the chaotic wilderness.
Tribe of the Sarl
Known for her exceptional hunting skills, Birna's precision in battle increases the accuracy and damage output of ranged units under her command.
Feathers of the Huntress
Legendary Lord
Ability: "Whalesong's Bane'' when on foot
The Hunted Huntress
What's the matter? Somebody cut out your tongue?
Defeated Birna the Huntress

In the ancient days when the seas roared with mythical beasts, a legendary blacksmith forged the Cetacean Cleaver. With a flat blade that mirrored the majesty of leviathans, the sword's hilt cradled a whale tooth, harnessing the power of the ocean's might. Tales sang of a hero who wielded the Cleaver, carving through the tempests with the strength of the deep, leaving behind a legacy etched in the salt-soaked winds.
Whalesong's Bane
Birna the Huntress
the Huntress
Birna
A mutant, but mostly akin to a shieldmaiden of the old sagas, a woman who seizes her own glories by her own hand.
Forged from the teeth of a slain Chaos Whale, the blade hungers for blood and battle and roars like the sea.
Whalesong's Bane

Amid the frozen tundra, a skilled bowyer crafted the Frostfang Longbow from the colossal tusks of ancient mammoths. Bound in ivory and whispered to by the spirits of the ice, the bow channeled the frigid essence of the arctic wilderness. As the Northern hunters drew its string, arrows soared like winter gusts, seeking prey with the precision of a glacial breeze. Legends echoed through the frozen wastes of a silent archer whose arrows sang the lullabies of the eternal frost
Tuskweave Longbow
The Ivory-bound Tuskweave Longbow shoots arrows guided by Birna's whispers.
Tuskweave Longbow
Birna has access to a unique instantly unlocked monster hunt to kill the Boartusk Warbeast
Ability: "Tuskweave Longbow''

Mutant Champion of the Kalti Delta

Champions of the Sarl are stalkers of the vast salt marshes that make up for the majority of the Sarl territory - their ability to traverse these treacherous grounds whilst remaining unfased by looming threats make them a force to be reckoned with.
Birna's harnasses more power with each succesful Monster Hunt
Mutant Huntress

Mutants of the Sarl

The stalkers of the Kalti Delta hunt alone, moving aross the vast salt marshes soundless as fearless prolific autonomous hunters.
Phantom of the Marshes
Few hunt River Trolls in their natural habitat, yet the Stalkers of the Kalti Delta venture deep into the marshes to hunt these dangerous creatures.
Sarl produce the most prolific hunters, who know how easily the role of hunter and prey can change whilst navigating treacherous terrain.
Attribute: Snipe for Sarl Hunter units
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Sarl Hunter units
Unit capacity: %+n for Sarl Hunter units
Upkeep: %+n% for Sarl Hunter units
Claim the Salt Marshes

In the heart of the treacherous Kalti Delta lies the formidable Castle of Alexandronov, a bastion that guards the marshes with an iron grip. Birna the Huntress has set her sights on this strategic fortress, knowing that its capture would grant her tribe dominion over the marshlands. To achieve this, she must navigate the perilous terrain, facing the dangers of the marshes and the defenders of the castle. But if she succeeds, her tribe will gain unfettered access to the bountiful hunting grounds, securing their place as masters of the marshes. And in a stroke of cunning, Birna manages to subjugate a river troll hag to her bidding, further solidifying her hold over the region.
Hero recruited: Giant River Troll Hag
Birna's mutatious allure subjugated these River Trolls of the Kalti Delta to sniff out their kin amidst the Salt Marshes.
Birna's Retinue (River Trolls)
[[col:red]]This Regiment of Renown will unlock only if you ally or Confederate Sarl faction or have Birna in your faction[[/col]]

Torn from the skull of the swamp-horror Mogwrath, this slick, lidless eye still twitches with hateful awareness. Set into a crude charm and hung from Birnaâ€™s belt, it grants visions through fog and darkness, guiding her arrow and revealing prey that hides where even light dares not go.
Mogwrath's Eye

The corrupted eye pulses with unnatural sight, marking prey with a silent curse. Enemies within the area become more vulnerable to missile fire, as their armour and resistance seem to wither beneath its stare.
Mogwrath's Eye
Ability: "Mogwrath's Eye''
